message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product that could be extremely beneficial to your business. While I can't disclose the exact details of the product at this time, I assure you it's worth no less than $1200000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This price reflects the potential value you could realize. If you're interested, we can discuss the specifics further. However, if you decline, I have another buyer lined up who is ready to pay $1200000.
